tool_description: Generates creative content ideas based on audience insights, trending topics, business goals, and content performance data to fuel ongoing content creation.

content_objectives.description: Content marketing objectives (awareness, engagement, conversion, retention)

seasonal_relevance.description: Whether to include seasonal content ideas

error_messages: Insufficient input data: Provide at least 1 persona, 5 trending topics, and 2 content formats.
Invalid content objectives: Use recognized objectives (awareness, engagement, conversion, retention).
Missing brand information: brand_voice_tone and industry_focus are required for relevant ideas.
Idea quantity out of range: Request between 10 and 100 content ideas.
Empty required arrays: All required array parameters must contain at least one item.
usage: Provide audience_personas, trending_topics, content_objectives, preferred_content_formats, brand_voice_tone, and industry_focus. Optionally specify content_themes, seasonal_relevance, and idea_quantity. Returns creative content ideas tailored to your parameters.

objective_alignment.description: How ideas align with content objectives
